Name: Dezzan
About the game: Playing Dezzan you will try your strength passing through the quests in different settings. Besides hundreds of traps, you will meet a lot of various enemies on your way. Face your fear, develop your thinking, reaction, craft, and strength if needed by using different weapons. You can choose a different playthrough style for every level. And there is a leaderboard for those who love to set records. Pass the quests quicker than other players and win your place of honor. Participate in the development. We listen to the ideas and try to introduce them into the game, and in the next updates, we plan will give each player an opportunity to create their own levels and combat with friends in the cooperative mode.
